items.title: Employers Need Help Managing Workers Who Are Taking Second Jobs
items.description: A new survey of U.S. employees shows many are turning to additional employment because they’re under financial strain.

items.title: My Employee Is Bad at His Job but Keeps Saying He’s Doing Great
items.description: His self-hype is out of touch with reality. Is this salvageable?

items.title: The Stock Market Isn’t Buying the Bears’ Gloomy Outlook
items.description: The S&P 500 just posted its best May since 1990.
